analyzed: buddhagadyaya buddhagajjaya
namaḥ buddhāya
namaḥ samantabhadrāya sarva gocara cakṣue
karuṇā amṛta kallola sindhave sūryyabandhave
jaya jaya dharmmarāja jana kṛta śarmma pūja
asadṛśa buddha līla ati pariśuddha śila
sphuṭita gabhasti jāla bahuvidha visva pala
jagati nirasta dosa praṇamita śasta veṣa
rucira vimukti bhūṣa magadha viśiṣṭa bhāṣa
daṇḍita bahu māra khaṇḍita bhava bhāra
añcita padapāta sañcita hita jāta
sāra hari vara śayana tāmarasa nibha nayana
loka jana sukha karaṇa lola sura nata caraṇa
kāla jaya caturatara śiladhara divasakara
sura nara pūjanīya ārya budha jana bodhana avīrya
para hita sādhana akāryya tribhuvana śāsana ācāryya
dānava ari padma āsana stha dhīra pūta citra āsana stha
vīta moha rudrāsanastha bodhi mūla vajrāsanastha
ajñāna ari bala prahara jña prajñā dhāna mahat ṣaṣ abhijña
dhiṣaṇā maya sāra sāyaka vipadā kula hetu hāyaka
ajara amara bhūti dāyaka sa carācara loka nāyaka
suśruta jana māyā ānandana viśruta kula māyā ānandana
iṣṭa vinaṣṭa samujjhita kopa tuṣṭa variṣṭha vivarjita pāpa
śiṣṭa viśiṣṭa vinirjjita tāpa aṣṭa catuṣṭaya lakṣaṇa rūpa
yogya bhāva gaṇanā hṛta sīma bhāgya dāya jana modana rāma
vākya leśa pariśoṣita kāma sākya rāja kula sāgara soma
prerita śāsana nīti viśāla dhārita bodhi manohara mūla
vārita māra vadhū jana līla pūrita pāramitā daśa śīla
śyāma prabhā pūraṇa anargha keśa vyāma prabhā lokaka prakāśa
cīrṇa akhila jñāna yoga ṛddhi candra
pūrṇa āgama khyāta dhīra arddhacandra ūrṇā ruci cheda bāla arddhacandra
nikuñcat bhava ādīnava aśeṣa buddha sat añcat guṇa āveśa śīla ādi śuddha
viriñcat prabhā bheda śobhā ādi siddha udañcat mahā ketu mālā anubaddha
anu samaya śubha sāra bhāṣaṇa atula guṇa dhara vīta bhīṣaṇa
ati malina bhava rāga roṣaṇa apara mita vara śīla bhūṣaṇa

original: 21. prasuta prahita prasava pracala prathita praguṇa pramada praphala
analyzed: prasuta prahita prasava pracala prathita praguṇa pramada praphala
praṇata pracura prabhava pradala prakaṭa praṇaya pratima prabala
nistāri vikhyāta viśva jana śaraṇa
śasta ari sat tyāga siddha kara caraṇa vistāri ṣaṣ bheda varṇa vara kiraṇa
bhakti dhara saṃsāra bheda raṇa raṅga mukti pura kalyāṇa moda muni tuṅga
sarasija niśruta viracita tantra sapadi tiraskṛta bhava bhaya yantra
budha jana śikṣita bahuvidha tantra tribhuvana viśruta nava guṇa mantra
bahu lola kathanīya rāva adhirāva guṇa śīla mahanīya sevā adhiseva
a vipāka ramaṇīya bhāva adhibhāva jagat eka garaṇīya deva adhideva
tapana śaśi śikhi mahaḥ satya avabodhana anaya kula maya tapaḥ satya avabādhana
aparimita guṇa vacaḥsatya avasādhana sakala jana hita catur satya avabodhana
dugati maya bhava karmma cakra pramarddana jagati kṛta vara dharmma cakra pravarttana
siddha āgama sadbhāvana su jñāpita pāka buddha āgama vikhyāpana vijñāpita nāka
śuddha āgama visphāraṇa vidhmāpita śoka ṛddhi āgama vistāraṇa vijñāpita loka
mṛta sa mṛd maya anna pātra labdha devatām cana vatsala tva dhāma gātra lupta śobhakān cana
utsa vṛnda śītamañju citra jāti vāñcana sat samantakūṭa śṛṅga datta pāda lāñchana
prathita carita saṅga gīti vīta kadana amita vimala dharmma śīla nīti sadana
bahula dhavala puñja hāra cāru radana śiśirakiraṇa maṇḍala abhirāma vadana
jāta divasīyam aham odita pitāmaha vīta mala loka hita pūta kuśala āvaha
bāhu bala ghora raṇa māra bahu vīra ha rāhu nayana a viṣaya pāda sarasīruha
vāmadeva kāma nātha sāma pāda rodhana hema rāśi dhāma cāru nāma rūpa śobhana
vāda baddha visphurat kudṛṣṭi dṛṣṭi sañcaya bheda citta sambhava prapañca patti sañcaya
pāda padma sañcarat praphulla padma sañcaya veda siddha śemuṣī prabhagna bhedya sañcaya
akhila loka pūjita prahita sarva śocana sakala tāpa vedana prabhava saṅga mocana
madhura sāra śītala prakaṭa bhavya vācana nirvaśeṣa gocara pratata buddhi locana
kiraṇa nivaha pramaṇḍita vitata puṣkara kaluṣa haraṇa sphurat nava lalita puṣkara
gamana samaya svayam nada damita puṣkara sakala bhuvana priyaṅkara caraṇa puṣkara
nitya peśala nitya dakṣiṇa nitya bhāva tathāgata nitya bhāsura nitya deśita nitya bhāva tathāgata
nitya vismaya nitya vatsala nitya moda tathāgata nitya maṅgala nitya sundara nitya pūjya tathāgata
trividha śubha calana vara jalaja nibha yugala vinaya maya vividha manu samita durita gala
mathita bahu viṣaya bhara bharita bhava nigala praṇata sura makuṭa maṇi ghaṭita pada yugala
helā viracita dolāyita jana mūla āgama vidhi dīpana vāṭa hālāhala nibha śālā bhava śubha līlā vidalana śāsana jhāṭa
bāla anaya mati jāla ādara hara śīla āyudha dhara vārida kūṭa kolāhala kara nālā giri gaja kāla ākṛti mada vega vighāṭa
vana mudita vispaṣṭa madhuratara nāda jana hṛdaya maddhya stha kamala mṛdu pāda
vinaya bala viccinna durita kula bheda anavarata saddharmma vitaraṇa vinoda
aruṇa pada tala sakala viṣayaka vimala daśavidha mati bala karuṇa jalanidhi lahari parikara satata kuśalita mahi tala
viśada dinamaṇi kiraṇa vikasita kamala mṛdu tala kara tala daśa diś upagata surabhi kula vara vadana vikasita parimala

original: 41. anagham atimanojñaṃ dharmmarājasya gadyaṃ likhati paṭhati yo vā sādaraṃ yaś śruṇoti
analyzed: anagham ati manojñam dharmmarājasya gadyam likhati paṭhati yaḥ vā sa ādaram yaḥ śruṇoti

original: tribhuvanabhavanāntaḥ prāpya bhogān aśeṣān anubhavati sa nityaṃ śāntanirvāṇasaukhyam.
analyzed: tribhuvana bhavana antar prāpya bhogān aśeṣān anubhavati sa nityam śānta nirvāṇa saukhyam
siddhiḥ astu śubham astu
nimi
